homePage.name: SHIRIN NAZARI
homePage.title: Front-End Developer
homePage.description:
A dynamic and passionate Front-End Developer with a strong enthusiasm for problem-solving and continuous learning.
Focused on building user-friendly and efficient web applications.

experience.nameAndJob: AP Signals – London, UK Mentor Assistant & Support
experience.working:
Students were asked weekly about their progress and upcoming learning goals.
Support was provided in reviewing concepts and answering questions.
When technical issues arose, efforts were made to connect learners with mentors or resources for solutions.
Extra help was offered to ensure learners stayed on track in their programming journey.
